about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into the ultimate action-packed VR adventure with Frupu VR Fruit Punch! Battle against the monstrous Mu and his army of fruits, as you mix and match to create delicious fruit cocktails that pack a punch. But be warned, these fruits are not your average ones. They're explosive and ready to knock you off your game. It's up to you to stay on your toes and use your lightning-fast reflexes to dodge and strike back.

With Frupu VR Fruit Punch, you'll have access to an array of combat moves, from left and right jabs to swift dodges, all designed to help you fight off Mu's minions and become the ultimate fruit punch master. As you progress, the challenges get tougher and the stakes higher, but don't worry, the rewards are even sweeter!

So, if you're ready to put your VR skills to the test, head to download Frupu VR Fruit Punch now. It's time to mix, match, and punch your way to the top!

Battle against the monstrous Mu and his army of fruits, as you mix and match to create delicious fruit cocktails that pack a punch. But be warned, these fruits are not your average ones. They're explosive and ready to knock you off your game. It's up to you to stay on your toes and use your lightning-fast reflexes to dodge and strike back.

With Frupu VR Fruit Punch, you'll have access to an array of combat moves, from left and right jabs to swift dodges, all designed to help you fight off Mu's minions and become the ultimate fruit punch master. As you progress, the challenges get tougher and the stakes higher, but don't worry, the rewards are even sweeter!

So, if you're ready to put your VR skills to the test, head to download Frupu VR Fruit Punch now. It's time to mix, match, and punch your way to the top!
name: Frupu VR Fruit Punch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon 400 Series or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Meta Quest, Oculus Meta Quest 2, requires Controllers

short_description: It is an action-based fighting fun game. Monster Mu throws fruits to you. He throws faster and faster, sometimes throwing multiple fruits at once. Punch the fruit at the right time and finish your fruit cocktail or the fruit will explode in your face. Caution: Don't let the toaster hit you.
